pathParameters.name: subscriptionId
pathParameters.description: The customer subscription identifier.

pathParameters.name: resourceGroupName
pathParameters.description: The name of the resource group.

pathParameters.name: clusterName
pathParameters.description: The name of the cluster resource.

pathParameters.name: applicationName
pathParameters.description: The name of the application resource.

pathParameters.name: serviceName
pathParameters.description: The name of the service resource in the format of {applicationName}~{serviceName}.

queryParameters.name: api-version
queryParameters.description: The version of the Service Fabric resource provider API. This is a required parameter and it's value must be "2020-03-01" for this specification.
